response_requirements.initial_response_description: Must respond within 4 business days; 'promptly' means quickly and without undue delay
response_requirements.final_response_notes: Common sense and good will should be guiding principles
response_requirements.extension_notes: May establish special schedule if requests interfere with normal duties

fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: State agencies: max $0.25/page; Other agencies: max $0.50/page; Judicial Dept: $0.50 first 20 pages, $0.25 thereafter

exemptions.description: Personnel files and similar files where disclosure would constitute invasion of personal privacy
Records of strategy sessions or negotiations of pending claims/litigation until finally adjudicated or settled
Records required confidential under general statutes or exempted by state or federal law
Test questions, scoring keys, examination data for licensing, employment, or academic exams
Real estate appraisals and feasibility estimates until contracts executed or proceedings abandoned
Records of strategy or negotiations with respect to collective bargaining

appeal_process.first_level_notes: File with FOIC within 30 days of denial; Commission may order mediation
appeal_process.civil_penalties: Up to $1,000 civil penalty by FOIC
appeal_process.criminal_penalties: Class B misdemeanor for failing to comply with FOIC order; Class A misdemeanor for willful violations

requester_requirements.request_format_notes: May inspect promptly without written request; written application required for copies
requester_requirements.specific_format: Inspection: no form required; Copies: written application required

agency_obligations.written_procedures_required: Must adopt written procedures for public access
agency_obligations.assistance_required: Must provide assistance to requesters; explain technical terms
agency_obligations.records_maintenance: Must maintain records in reasonably accessible manner

oversight_body.name: Freedom of Information Commission
oversight_body.role: Adjudicates appeals; enforces compliance; imposes penalties up to $1,000

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields manually verified from official Connecticut statute. 4 business day response ('promptly'). State agencies max $0.25/page; others max $0.50/page. No inspection fee. FOIC administrative appeal within 30 days; Hartford Superior Court within 45 days. Civil penalties up to $1,000; criminal penalties for violations. 9 specific exemptions with Conn. Gen. Stat. § 1-210(b) subsection citations.
